description: Welcome to 2503 Burian Drive â€” a rare non-strata duplex/Rowhome in a family-friendly Coquitlam neighbourhood. This well-kept home offers a bright, comfortable layout with spacious living areas and 3 generous bedrooms throughout (option to add 2 extra bedrooms.) Enjoy the freedom of fee-simple ownership with no strata fees or restrictions. Close to parks, schools, shopping, and transit, this home combines convenience with quiet suburban living. A great opportunity to own in a desirable and walkable community.
